Book.Name: zigzag

TitlePage.Subtitle: A &GAP;3 package for Descent Algebras of Finite Coxeter Groups
TitlePage.TitleComment: WARNING: This is a badly documented alpha version of the ZigZag package. Future versions of the package will most likely be incompatible with this version.
TitlePage.Author: Götz Pfeiffer goetz.pfeiffer@nuigalway.ie http://schmidt.nuigalway.ie/zigzag
TitlePage.Address:
Department of Mathematics
National University of Ireland Galway
University Road
Galway, Ireland
TitlePage.Abstract: The descent algebra of a finite Coxeter group W of rank n is a remarkable 2^n-dimensional subalgebra of the group algebra of W. This package provides some tools to work with descent algebras and related structures in various ways.
